channel.title: What do you think about my crappy trailer?
channel.description:
I made this trailer for a server. Spent around 2 hours and then I just gave up as you will see some lack of effort especially near the ending.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DNEP32EHP_M
Tell me what'cha think :) |The servers not being hosted anymore^ lol :')

item.title: What do you think about my crappy trailer?
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

Change the music
“perfection - 24/7 - join today” should be removed from the start of the video
Too many words floating around without any gameplay, how about make the words float over actual clips of the game
^and make them go slower (the words, not the clip)
Spinning the camera doesn’t show anything special about the game
Add more clips, just two doesn’t cut it
“join today” at the end needs to be much longer

could be worse though.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think about my crappy trailer?

item.title: What do you think about my crappy trailer?
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Bowser jr:

It is crap. Laggy rotation and terrible music. Do not choose a genre that only a small part of the population can bear.

The guy liked my song choice (eminem is the best! <3) it’s not a laggy rotation it’s a crappy slow motion effect

Read full topic

item.title: What do you think about my crappy trailer?
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

It’s crap, why bother posting it if you already know this?

I evaluate crap in many different ways. It is my understanding, from taking reviews, that the I have this recognized for a oncoming success on a future attempt. This also gives other members to learn from other people’s mistakes. This is my way of sharing “crap” for a better cause.

^ I’m only trolling i posted for lolz

Read full topic
